data.subTitle: 回车提交
data.content:
$("id").onkeypress = function (event) {    
    event = (event) ? event : ((window.event) ? window.event : "")
    keyCode = event.keyCode ? event.keyCode : (event.which ? event.which : event.charCode);    
    if (keyCode == 13) {
        $("SubmitLogin").onclick();
    }
}
